function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of disaster risk management education at all levels","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to emergent infectious diseases and other disasters","Mitigation":"Integrating disaster risk management education into national education curricula","Technologies":"Educational technology for curriculum development and delivery","People":"Students, educators, and government officials","Owner":"Government and educational institutions"},{"Description":"Insufficient investments in research and development","Impact":"Limited knowledge and technology development capacity for disease mitigation","Mitigation":"Increased government and enterprise investments in research and development","Technologies":"Biotechnology, medical research, and data analytics","People":"Researchers, scientists, and government policymakers","Owner":"Government and private enterprises"},{"Description":"GHG emissions exacerbating global warming and climate change","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to emergent infectious diseases and other climate-related risks","Mitigation":"Reduction of GHG emissions through policy and technology initiatives","Technologies":"Renewable energy, carbon capture and storage, and sustainable transportation","People":"General population, policymakers, and industry leaders","Owner":"Government, environmental organizations, and industry stakeholders"},{"Description":"Lack of institutional capacities for crisis prevention and risk reduction","Impact":"Inefficient response to crises and limited preparedness for disasters and pandemics","Mitigation":"Integration of national, state, and local plans via agile and responsive institutions","Technologies":"Integrated management systems, data analytics, and communication platforms","People":"Government agencies, emergency responders, and local communities","Owner":"Government and local authorities"}]}
